channel.title: Several Codes are needed for my new server
channel.description:
Since I started a new server and that I am not a pro coder, I need several codes to start me off.... please post the code and explain how to put it in, such as where, which file, how, etc.....
I am using Project16 V6 as the base server.
These codes are the ones I need: (It will be updated to delete the ones I got and for new ones...)
-::god Godmode code for admins and above -::noclip Noclip for Mods and above -"Perfect" Ring code, the one so that if mods or above wear it, it will get the bonuses extremely high so that you KO anyone -How to change spawn point code, so that the players don't have to start out a varrock -Infinite hp code, for owner only... -::master code, for mods and above... -SILAB ITEMS!!!! How do I do that!?!?!?
And that's it for now....
Thanks.

item.title: Several Codes are needed for my new server

item.title: Several Codes are needed for my new server
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

You pretty much have all of those commands.
To change the spawning point:

Go to player.java

Find first coords (( Basically the only coodrs in there ))

Change the X and Y Coords.
Dont know how?

InGame, stand on the point you want to be the spawning point.
Type ::mypos
There you go!

Read full topic

item.title: Several Codes are needed for my new server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

1 sec im getting something together for this…

heres some so far

fly code:

if (command.startsWith("nofly") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
pEmote = 0x328;
pWalk = 0x333;
playerSE = 0x328;
playerSEW = 0x333;
playerSER = 0x333;
playerSEA = 0x333;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage("GoodBye");
}
if (command.startsWith("fly") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
pEmote = 1501;
pWalk = 1851;
playerSE = 1501;
playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1540;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage("Weeeee!");
}

this will make anyone with 2 and greater access fly

crappy noclip command(the reason its crappy because cheat clients can get right past it

if (command.startsWith("noclip") && (playerRights >= 1)) {
sendMessage("you are now nocliping");
}
else {
sendMessage("you cant noclip goodbye");
disconnect = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
}

this will allow anyone with 1 or greator access to noclip and if theyr’e below it they get disconnected and banned

ult perfect ring:

find

item = 773

and replace that whole line with this

item = 773	'perfect'_ring	A_perfect_ruby_ring.	1469.99280576915	1469.99280576915	1760.58823743125	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999

new spawn point:

find:

// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet

and under you should see

		teleportToX = 3254;//3072;
		teleportToY = 3420;//3312;

or something similar

replace the teleportToX = to coord x
replace the teleportToY = to coord y

infinite health:
find public boolean process

add this under it

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Name Here")){  // infinity health
		if(IsDead)
		IsDead = false;
		NewHP = playerLevel[3];
		}

master command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2)
         {
   addSkillXP(486000000, 0); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 1); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 2); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 3); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 4); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 5); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 6); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 7); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 8); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 9); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 10); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
   addSkillXP(486000000, 12); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 13); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 14); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 15); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 16); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 17); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 18); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 19); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 20); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 21); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
   addSkillXP(486000000, 23); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
   sendMessage("message here");
}

hope this helps

Read full topic
